name: THE WORST GAME
description:
click.. click... click.. click...
Sit and stare whilst you violently click at the button in the centre. Unlock achievements and waste your precious time. Rank amongst the top players and stand on top of the leaderboard… So do you have what it takes to become the worst gamer?

Features:
  • Pixel Gameplay
  • Click Button
  • Click Button MORE
  • Leaderboards and Rankings
  • some achievements.
  • gamin

Messages from the Developer:

"ook... ook..ook.. oo oo.. ahh ahh"
